## createMutex

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/utils/useful-stuff/mutex.ts" sourceLine="267" packageName="commandkit" />

Creates a new mutex instance with the specified configuration



*Example*

```typescript
const mutex = createMutex({
  timeout: 60000,
  storage: new RedisMutexStorage()
});
```

```ts title="Signature"
function createMutex(options: MutexOptions): Mutex
```
Parameters

<MemberInfo kind="parameter" type={`<a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/mutex-options#mutexoptions'>MutexOptions</a>`} />
